data.title: Serene Renewal Medical Spa & Women's Wellness
data.meta_site_name: Serene Renewal Medical Spa & Women's Wellness
data.text:
All of the items listed are things we use ourselves and highly recommend. Click on the image to order the product through Amazon for quick delivery!

When applying foundation, using a sponge like these are great! But you need to change your sponge frequently as these can contain bacteria and cause outbreaks.

After any medical spa treatment, you will want to refrain from make up that contains harsh chemicals. Bare Minerals is one of many mineral based makeups that is safe after any procedure.

Mineral based makeup is recommended after any medical spa procedure. Regular make up has harsh chemicals which can interrupt your results. Some prefer liquid foundation, and Bare Minerals liquid is nice and light

For an excellent daily cleanser, Visha Advanced is one that is great for all skin types. Helps with acne prone skin, or with aging skin. Safe with natural ingredients. We offer this in the spa, or order from Amazon for quick delivery.

For an excellent daily cleanser, Visha Mommy Cleanser is safe for all skin types and even safer for sensitive skin. It helps sooth hormonal and cystic acne within days of first use. Safe with natural ingredients and ok to use during pregnancy. We offer this in the spa, or order from Amazon for quick delivery.

Visha Skincare's Face to feet is so soothing and moisturizing for all parts of your body. Even safe for those private areas! The all natural ingredients are safe enough even for a young child and can help improve skin conditions like eczema

100% Witch hazel is soothing to your face/body/and even private regions. Used often to calm inflammation, witch hazel can make your sore areas feel cool. Can be used as astringent for the face, or on sensitive skin such as hemorrhoids or vulvar skin.

Revitalash Conditioner works with the Shampoo to help prevent hair shedding and thicken the appearance of your hair. Not to mention leave it silky smooth!

After permanent makeup, fractionated CO2, or surgery, Aquaphor is a safe ointment to sooth your healing skin. When its necessary to prevent scab formation and stay moist, Aquaphor is what we recommend

Whether you just had a baby, or you had surgery to correct the area after a baby this product helps with pain relief and numbing the area that is freshly healing

If you have an upcoming surgery like hysterectomy, laparoscopy, or tummy tuck, lidocaine patches are a great way to safely take that pain away without the use of heavy pain killers

Sometimes pain during intercourse is related to pain on insertion from vaginal spasm from a distant memory. Use of desensitizing lube may help remind you that intercourse can be pleasurable. Please ensure your initial problem has been addressed by your doctor.

We often recommend menstrual cups to help with heavy menstrual flow or if you are embarrassed by odor from your menstrual cycle. These cups are disposible and can last up to 12 hours! There are cups that are reusable but we have found these disposible ones easier to manage in public places.
